hero.text: We use talent and technology to design and build Web and Mobile Apps

subText.text: We are a team of individuals that brings together talents from Product Development, Software Engineering and UI/UX design.
Our mission is to make products that will bring delightful experiences to our users and apps that deliver revenue.

whatWeDo.title: Why we're here
whatWeDo.mainText: We work with Startups and Enterprises

subText.text: “Conflux”, is another term for confluence, which means “the process of merging”.
With that being said, we are here to work with people with big ideas to build beautiful products together and bring them to consumers.
